text: Abdul Halim (born 2 November 1998) is a Bangladeshi first-class and List A cricketer. In December 2015 he was named in Bangladesh's squad for the 2016 Under-19 Cricket World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:Khulna Division cricketers Category:Bangladesh East Zone cricketers Category:Bangladesh under-19 cricketers
title: Abdul Halim (cricketer)
